name: com.meta.xr.sdk.core
description: Meta XR Core SDK package provides the latest features to create immersive experiences for Meta XR devices.

samples.description: Simple samples demonstrating core VR features
A basic sample demonstrating core MR features Scene and Passthrough
A sample showing the various tracking origins for VR and MR
